attributes.action: not grant Margaret Thatcher a state funeral at the tax payer's expense when she finally dies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why would this Labour government ever consider using our taxes to pay for a state funeral for Margaret Thatcher. The reported cost of £3m could surely be better utilised e.g. a bonus for all nurses

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
